title: Form 5472 (Information Return of a 25% Foreign-Owned U.S. Corporation or a Foreign Corporation Engaged in a U.S. Trade or Business)

sections.label: Part I
sections.title: Reporting Corporation.
summary: All reporting corporations must complete Part I.

fields.label: 1a. Name of reporting corporation
fields.help: Enter the official legal name of the entity as it appears on IRS filings.

fields.label: 1b. Employer identification number
fields.help: Provide the EIN assigned to the reporting corporation.

fields.label: Number, street, and room or suite no. (If a P.O. box, see instructions.)
fields.help: Street address of the reporting corporation's main office.

fields.label: City or town, state, and ZIP code (If a foreign address, see instructions.)
fields.help: City, state, and ZIP code of the reporting corporation's address.

fields.label: 1c. Total assets
fields.help: Total assets of the reporting corporation.

fields.label: 1d. Principal business activity
fields.help: Describe the primary business activity during the tax year.

fields.label: 1e. Principal business activity code
fields.help: Enter the six-digit code that best describes the principal business activity.

fields.label: 1f. Total value of gross payments made or received reported on this Form 5472. See instructions.
fields.help: Enter the total value of gross payments made or received as reported on this Form 5472.

fields.label: 1g. Total number of Forms 5472 filed for the tax year
fields.help: Enter the total number of Forms 5472 filed for the tax year.

fields.label: 1h. Total value of gross payments made or received reported on all Forms 5472. See instructions.
fields.help: Enter the total value of gross payments made or received as reported on all Forms 5472.

fields.label: 1i. Check here if this is a consolidated filing of Form 5472
fields.help: Check this box if filing Form 5472 on behalf of multiple entities.

fields.label: 1j. Check here if this is the initial year for which the U.S. reporting corporation is filing a Form 5472
fields.help: Check this box if this is the first year the reporting corporation is filing Form 5472.

fields.label: 1k. Total number of Parts VIII attached to Form 5472
fields.help: Enter the total number of Parts VIII attached to Form 5472.

fields.label: 1l. Country of incorporation
fields.help: Country where the entity was formed.

fields.label: 1m. Date of incorporation
fields.help: Date when the entity was formed.

fields.label: 1n. Country(ies) under whose laws the reporting corporation files an income tax return as a resident
fields.help: Country where the entity files an income tax return as a resident.

fields.label: 1o. Principal country(ies) where business is conducted
fields.help: Country where the entity conducts its primary business activities.

fields.label: 2. Check here if, at any time during the tax year, any foreign person owned, directly or indirectly, at least 50% of (a) the total voting power of all classes of the stock of the reporting corporation entitled to vote, or (b) the total value of all classes of stock of the reporting corporation
fields.help: Check this box if any foreign person owned at least 50% of the reporting corporation during the tax year.

fields.label: 3. Check here if the reporting corporation is a foreign-owned domestic disregarded entity (foreign-owned U.S. DE) treated as a corporation for purposes of section 6038A. See instructions
fields.help: Check this box if you are a foreign-owned U.S. DE.

sections.label: Part II
sections.title: 25% Foreign Shareholder
summary: Details for the foreign owner or single-member LLC owner.

fields.label: Foreign shareholder name
fields.help: Full name of the foreign shareholder reported on the form.

fields.label: Country of residence
fields.help: Country where the shareholder maintains primary residence.

fields.label: Percentage of ownership
fields.help: Enter the percentage of ownership held by the shareholder.

fields.label: Nature of ownership
fields.help: Explain whether the ownership is direct or indirect.

sections.label: Part III
sections.title: Related Party
summary: List parties with whom reportable transactions occurred.

fields.label: Related party details
fields.help: Describe each related party involved in reportable transactions.

sections.label: Part IV
sections.title: Monetary Transactions
summary: Report total annual inflows and outflows instead of individual invoices.

fields.label: Sales of tangible property other than stock in trade

sections.label: Part V
sections.title: Reportable Transactions of a Reporting Corporation That Is a Foreign-Owned U.S. DE
summary: Describe on an attached separate sheet any other transaction as defined by Regulations section 1.482-1(i)(7), such as amounts paid or received in connection with the formation, dissolution, acquisition, and disposition of the entity, including contributions to and distributions from the entity, and check here

fields.label: Non-monetary transaction summary
fields.help: List contributions, asset transfers, or debt forgiveness that lacked cash flow.

sections.label: Part VI
sections.title: Nonmonetary and Less-Than-Full Consideration Transactions Between the Reporting Corporation and the Foreign Related Party
summary: Describe these transactions on an attached separate sheet and check here.

fields.label: Ownership changes
fields.help: Note any ownership changes, transfers, or restructuring during the year.

fields.label: Accurate information confirmation
fields.help: Confirm that the information presented is complete and accurate.

fields.label: Other relevant transactions
fields.help: Include other significant related-party transactions not covered elsewhere.

sections.label: Part VII
sections.title: Additional Information
summary: All reporting corporations must complete Part VII.

fields.label: Authorized signature
fields.help: Name and title of the person authorized to sign the return.

sections.label: Part VIII
sections.title: Cost-Sharing Arrangements
summary: Note: Complete a separate Part VIII for each CSA in which the reporting corporation was a participant during the tax year. Report all amounts in U.S. dollars. (See instructions.)

sections.label: Part IX
sections.title: Base Erosion Payments and Base Erosion Tax Benefits Under Section 59A
